detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found:
	Contract AugustCoin (../../Solidifi-bugInjection-data/Reentrancy-primitive/Sol/37.sol#104-225) has payable functions:
	 - AugustCoin.fallback() (../../Solidifi-bugInjection-data/Reentrancy-primitive/Sol/37.sol#214-216)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
detectors.markdown:
Contract locking ether found:
	Contract [AugustCoin](../../Solidifi-bugInjection-data/Reentrancy-primitive/Sol/37.sol#L104-L225) has payable functions:
	 - [AugustCoin.fallback()](../../Solidifi-bugInjection-data/Reentrancy-primitive/Sol/37.sol#L214-L216)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
